features: 【Compatible Models】S3501 pads fit for Shark Steam Pocket Mop S3500 series: S3501, S3501SPN, S3501WM, S3502C, S3504AMZ, S3550, S3601, S3601C, S3601CO, S3601D, S3601K, S3601Q, S3601W, S3601WC, S3801, S3801CO, S3901, S3901A, S3901C, S3901D, S3901FS, S3901K, S3901Q, S3901W, S3901WC, S3901WM, S2902, SE400, SE450, S3450, S3452, S3455K.

【Effective Cleaning】 S3501 shark steam mop replacement pads with super strong water absorption, won't leave water stains on the floor and won't push dirt around. Anti-scratch, strong decontamination, non-depilation, durable and easy to clean, machine washable reusable.
【Fit for All Floors】shark s3601 steam mop pads are ideal for all kinds of floors and surfaces, including wooden floor, ceramic tile, laminate floor, marble floor, carpet, etc.
【Easy to Install】S3601 shark steam mop replacement pads can be easily installed and replaced by anyone, does not take a lot of time.You can get back to cleaning as soon as possible!

【Standard Size】12 1/2'' x 7''. These shark steam mop pads are standard size mop pads, NOT XL/extra large size pads, does not fit the XL mop head. Please check your rectangle mop head size to confirm the pads fit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Microfiber Steam Mop Replacement pads Featuring scrub strips, these replacement pads are ideal for tackling tough stains and grime, making your cleaning sessions more efficient and effective. Work for all sealed hard floors, like wooden floors, ceramic tile, laminate floors, marble floors. Durable and easy to clean, machine washable & reusable. Save your money, give you a comfortable and clean house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This grey/design works better than plain white pads
reviews.reviewText: When I read about the zig zag design pads which includes alternate fibers to release dirt from your floors, I was skeptical… but, these bicolor pads worked si much better on my tile floors. The kitchen and high traffic areas were much easier to steam mop, especially with the ability scrub off dirt and grime areas. I haven’t tried the bicolor pads on any tiny lot wood flooring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this steam mop. I love that no chemicals are needed. I love how clean my floors feel after using this mop.These covers work well, not as well as I had hoped. They are very difficult to put on. I had thought using the little pink tab was the trick and then the second one I was putting on with the tab, the tab ripped off. Once on they do stay on. Good luck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are a perfect replacement for my steam cleaner. I like that they are super affordable and extremely durable. I have used it to do extremely cleaning on the floor. They are able to clean paint out of the floor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have the Shark S3501 Steam Mop and these replacement pads seem to be a bit too small for my mop steamer? I see other's pictures and it seems like they put the pad on with no hassle. I was having trouble getting one of the pads onto the steamer. Not quite sure why. I was eventually able to get it on but it was difficult and time consuming to get on. For the price though, it's convenient to have! So you're able to change them without having to keep washing the two that comes with the steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too tight, but can be made to work
reviews.reviewText: I got this pack of Jirmory steam mop replacement pockets for my Shark S3501 steam mop. This model is listed in the description so I got them knowing they were made specifically for the model I had. They arrived and are good, heavy pads with a nice mop texture material that feels like it will clean well. The inside has the similar mesh construction my original pads have, so from a quality standpoint, they seem to be built similar and are comparable quality to the originals.The only problem with these is when I put them on they are VERY tight. All the pads I have I can pull on from one side and almost one-handed pull them into place. They come off just as easily. These pads are so tight that I have to put each side on at the bottom, and then gently slide them a little bit at a time up into place. I popped a seam on the first one trying to pull it on, but was able to get the second one on without damage. Once on, they work just fine and the hook and loop connects around the back. They clean just fine and then are a bit difficult to remove again.Outside of the fit issue, they are perfect and the value is very good for six of them. I will continue to use them and hope they will loosen up with continued use. I think if they were just a half an inch wider they would be perfect. If you are willing to wrestle with these a little, then I do think they are worth it, but if you want something that goes on and off easy then these would not be the right choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits As It Should
reviews.reviewText: I got a new Shark steamer and they never give you enough pads so I saw these and needed them. They fit like they should and soak up the steam really well.So far they have help up with the two times I have cleaned the floor. They went through the wash with no problem and no extra fibers on the other clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work well on my Lift-Away Professional
reviews.reviewText: I love finally having extra mop heads so I don't have to keep using the same dirty ones or at least look dirty from many uses even after washing. These are a little tight going on because they have elastic in the corners to hold them on better. I really had no trouble getting them on though. They have the same velcro closing on them that the original pads had to hold them on. They are a little bigger than my previous ones so bunch at the top a little on my Lift-Away Pro, but there is no issue at all when using them. These pads work very well and the terry fabric helps get the dirt from all the grout in the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good cleaning capabilities
reviews.reviewText: So, through no fault of the seller, I did not pay close attention to the models of Shark Steam mops this fit, so was sad to find out the hard way that it did not fit my steam mop. However, I used it to spot treat deep stains on my hardwood floors in my kitchen, and it worked a treat! It seems to have more abrasiveness to it than my typical covers (but not so much that it would scratch the floors). I also found out, that in a pinch, I could get these covers to fit over my original Swiffer mop, which worked out fantastically for me. The best part of these covers is that they are dual sided, so if your floors are especially dirty (or if you are neurotic like me and just want to ensure a clean floor), you can rotate them half way through cleaning.
